title: Strengthening Leadership Competencies: Deep Learning and Knowledge Transfer Skills in Medical Education

context.prior_knowledge: Completion of advanced studies and experience in executing high-level projects
context.additional_context: Practical Competency Enhancement Program for Corporate Management/HR Professionals

learning_goals: Learners can abstract and explain medical education content into generalizable principles.
Learners evaluate their ability to integrate diverse medical cases and apply them to new situations.
Through formative assessment items provided in a mobile environment, learners self-diagnose their deep learning levels.

constraints.tech_requirements: Limited tech environment (no PC, smartphone only)

difficulty: Moderate - Standard complexity with some constraints
